examples.example: 每一个名称的背后都可能有着一段独特的故事。

translate.english: Behind every name there may be a unique story.

examples.example: 这个可爱的小镇有一个美丽的名称。

translate.english: This lovely town has a beautiful name.

examples.example: 每一个商品都有它特定的名称，方便我们去认知和选择。

translate.english: Every commodity has its specific name to facilitate our recognition and choice.
